enrolmentSection.title: Enter your Insurance Premium Tax registration details

fields.infoText: ##If the business is based in the UK

fields.label: Enter the business postcode
fields.helpText: This is the postcode of the main place of business that you registered for Insurance Premium Tax.

fields.infoText: ##If the business is not based in the UK

fields.label: Enter the country code
fields.helpText: This is the 2-letter country code of the main place of business that you registered for Insurance Premium Tax. Use capital letters, for example DE for Germany and FR for France.

fields.infoText: You can’t complete multiple forms at the same time with the same access code, we hope to introduce this feature soon.

sections.title: Insurance Premium Tax
sections.description: Tell us how much IPT your business owes for this return period.

fields.label: Standard rate IPT
fields.helpText: Deduct any standard credits that are due to you, enter 0 if nothing is owed at standard rate

fields.label: Higher rate IPT
fields.helpText: Deduct any higher rate credits that are due to you, enter 0 if nothing is owed at higher rate

fields.infoText:
You can correct errors from previous Insurance Premium Tax returns if one of these criteria apply:
 * the amount does not exceed £10,000 
 * the amount is between £10,000 and £50,000 and does not exceed 1% of the net value of taxable premiums (excluding tax) due for this return period 
You won't be able to correct errors if the amount exceeds £50,000, contact HMRC separately for advice.

fields.label: Do you wish to correct any errors from previous IPT returns?

fields.infoText:
Avoid financial penalties by ensuring we receive your completed return and payment on account by the due date.

If you give incomplete or inaccurate information, we may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.

By accepting, you declare that the information that you have provided is true and complete.

fields.label: Enter an email address if you would like confirmation that your report has been submitted

fields.infoText: This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.

fields.label: Information about paying IPT
fields.infoText:
If you have already set up a Direct Debit for this tax, you don't need to do anything else. Your payment will be collected automatically from your bank.

 Otherwise, paying electronically, such as BACS, CHAPS or Faster Payments, is an easy and secure way to pay. Make sure to include your IPT registration number on any payment.

Sort code: 08-32-00

Account number: 11963163

Account name: HMRC Insurance Premium Tax

Find out more about how to pay your IPT at
 https://www.gov.uk/guidance/pay-insurance-premium-tax
[What do you think of this service?](https://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/4669767/Feedback-Survey-IPT) (takes 1 minute)
